## Premium feature note
If the issue is about `jfp` premium features (login, save, notes, collections, sync, or `--mine/--saved/--all`), those require a paid Pro subscription.
Pricing: https://pro.jeffreysprompts.com/pricing

If you believe you are subscribed and still blocked, mention the account email and command used.
